cpu_time_active.Name: cpu_time_active
cpu_time_active.Help: The amount of time that the CPU is active in any capacity

cpu_time_guest.Name: cpu_time_guest
cpu_time_guest.Help: The amount of time that the CPU is running a virtual CPU for a guest operating system

cpu_time_guest_nice.Name: cpu_time_guest_nice
cpu_time_guest_nice.Help: The amount of time that the CPU is running a virtual CPU for a guest operating system, which is low-priority and can be interrupted by other processes

cpu_time_idle.Name: cpu_time_idle
cpu_time_idle.Help: The amount of time that the CPU is idle

cpu_time_iowait.Name: cpu_time_iowait
cpu_time_iowait.Help: The amount of time that the CPU is waiting for I/O operations to complete

cpu_time_irq.Name: cpu_time_irq
cpu_time_irq.Help: The amount of time that the CPU is servicing interrupts

cpu_time_nice.Name: cpu_time_nice
cpu_time_nice.Help: The amount of time that the CPU is in user mode with low-priority processes, which can easily be interrupted by higher-priority processes

cpu_time_softirq.Name: cpu_time_softirq
cpu_time_softirq.Help: The amount of time that the CPU is servicing software interrupts

cpu_time_steal.Name: cpu_time_steal
cpu_time_steal.Help: The amount of time that the CPU is in stolen time, which is time spent in other operating systems in a virtualized environment

cpu_time_system.Name: cpu_time_system
cpu_time_system.Help: The amount of time that the CPU is in system mode

cpu_time_user.Name: cpu_time_user
cpu_time_user.Help: The amount of time that the CPU is in user mode

cpu_usage_active.Name: cpu_usage_active
cpu_usage_active.Help: The percentage of time that the CPU is active in any capacity

cpu_usage_guest.Name: cpu_usage_guest
cpu_usage_guest.Help: The percentage of time that the CPU is running a virtual CPU for a guest operating system

cpu_usage_guest_nice.Name: cpu_usage_guest_nice
cpu_usage_guest_nice.Help: The percentage of time that the CPU is running a virtual CPU for a guest operating system, which is low-priority and can be interrupted by other processes

cpu_usage_idle.Name: cpu_usage_idle
cpu_usage_idle.Help: The percentage of time that the CPU is idle

cpu_usage_iowait.Name: cpu_usage_iowait
cpu_usage_iowait.Help: The percentage of time that the CPU is waiting for I/O operations to complete

cpu_usage_irq.Name: cpu_usage_irq
cpu_usage_irq.Help: The percentage of time that the CPU is servicing interrupts

cpu_usage_nice.Name: cpu_usage_nice
cpu_usage_nice.Help: The percentage of time that the CPU is in user mode with low-priority processes, which higher-priority processes can easily interrupt

cpu_usage_softirq.Name: cpu_usage_softirq
cpu_usage_softirq.Help: The percentage of time that the CPU is servicing software interrupts

cpu_usage_steal.Name: cpu_usage_steal
cpu_usage_steal.Help: The percentage of time that the CPU is in stolen time

cpu_usage_system.Name: cpu_usage_system
cpu_usage_system.Help: The percentage of time that the CPU is in system mode

cpu_usage_user.Name: cpu_usage_user
cpu_usage_user.Help: The percentage of time that the CPU is in user mode

disk_inodes_free.Name: disk_inodes_free
disk_inodes_free.Help: The number of available index nodes on the disk

disk_inodes_total.Name: disk_inodes_total
disk_inodes_total.Help: The total number of index nodes reserved on the disk

disk_inodes_used.Name: disk_inodes_used
disk_inodes_used.Help: The number of used index nodes on the disk

disk_total.Name: disk_total
disk_total.Help: Total space on the disks, including used and free

disk_used_percent.Name: disk_used_percent
disk_used_percent.Help: The percentage of total disk space that is used

diskio_iops_in_progress.Name: diskio_iops_in_progress
diskio_iops_in_progress.Help: The number of I/O requests that have been issued to the device driver but have not yet completed

diskio_io_time.Name: diskio_io_time
diskio_io_time.Help: The amount of time that the disk has had I/O requests queued

diskio_reads.Name: diskio_reads
diskio_reads.Help: The number of disk read operations

diskio_read_bytes.Name: diskio_read_bytes
diskio_read_bytes.Help: The number of bytes read from the disks

diskio_read_time.Name: diskio_read_time
diskio_read_time.Help: The amount of time that read requests have waited on the disks

diskio_write_bytes.Name: diskio_write_bytes
diskio_write_bytes.Help: The number of bytes written to the disks

diskio_write_time.Name: diskio_write_time
diskio_write_time.Help: The amount of time that write requests have waited on the disks

ethtool_bw_in_allowance_exceeded.Name: ethtool_bw_in_allowance_exceeded
ethtool_bw_in_allowance_exceeded.Help: The number of packets queued and/or dropped because the inbound aggregate bandwidth exceeded the maximum for the instance

ethtool_bw_out_allowance_exceeded.Name: ethtool_bw_out_allowance_exceeded
ethtool_bw_out_allowance_exceeded.Help: The number of packets queued and/or dropped because the outbound aggregate bandwidth exceeded the maximum for the instance

ethtool_conntrack_allowance_exceeded.Name: ethtool_conntrack_allowance_exceeded
ethtool_conntrack_allowance_exceeded.Help: The number of packets dropped because connection tracking exceeded the maximum for the instance and new connections could not be established

ethtool_linklocal_allowance_exceeded.Name: ethtool_linklocal_allowance_exceeded
ethtool_linklocal_allowance_exceeded.Help: The number of packets dropped because the PPS of the traffic to local proxy services exceeded the maximum for the network interface

ethtool_pps_allowance_exceeded.Name: ethtool_pps_allowance_exceeded
ethtool_pps_allowance_exceeded.Help: The number of packets queued and/or dropped because the bidirectional PPS exceeded the maximum for the instance

mem_active.Name: mem_active
mem_active.Help: The amount of memory that has been used in some way

mem_available.Name: mem_available
mem_available.Help: The amount of memory that is available and can be given instantly to processes

mem_available_percent.Name: mem_available_percent
mem_available_percent.Help: The percentage of memory that is available and can be given instantly to processes

mem_buffered.Name: mem_buffered
mem_buffered.Help: The amount of memory that is being used for buffers

mem_cached.Name: mem_cached
mem_cached.Help: The amount of memory that is being used for file caches

mem_free.Name: mem_free
mem_free.Help: The amount of memory that isn't being used

mem_inactive.Name: mem_inactive
mem_inactive.Help: The amount of memory that has been recently used but is reclaimable

mem_used.Name: mem_used
mem_used.Help: The amount of memory currently in use

mem_used_percent.Name: mem_used_percent
mem_used_percent.Help: The percentage of memory currently in use

net_bytes_recv.Name: net_bytes_recv
net_bytes_recv.Help: The number of bytes received by the network interface

net_bytes_sent.Name: net_bytes_sent
net_bytes_sent.Help: The number of bytes sent by the network interface

net_drop_in.Name: net_drop_in
net_drop_in.Help: The number of packets received by the network interface that were dropped

net_drop_out.Name: net_drop_out
net_drop_out.Help: The number of packets transmitted by the network interface that were dropped

net_err_in.Name: net_err_in
net_err_in.Help: The number of receive errors detected by the network interface

net_err_out.Name: net_err_out
net_err_out.Help: The number of transmit errors detected by the network interface

net_packets_sent.Name: net_packets_sent
net_packets_sent.Help: The number of packets sent by the network interface

net_packets_recv.Name: net_packets_recv
net_packets_recv.Help: The number of packets received by the network interface

netstat_tcp_close.Name: netstat_tcp_close
netstat_tcp_close.Help: The number of TCP connections with no state

netstat_tcp_close_wait.Name: netstat_tcp_close_wait
netstat_tcp_close_wait.Help: The number of TCP connections waiting for a termination request from the client

netstat_tcp_closing.Name: netstat_tcp_closing
netstat_tcp_closing.Help: The number of TCP connections that are waiting for a termination request with acknowledgement from the client

netstat_tcp_established.Name: netstat_tcp_established
netstat_tcp_established.Help: The number of TCP connections established

netstat_tcp_fin_wait1.Name: netstat_tcp_fin_wait1
netstat_tcp_fin_wait1.Help: The number of TCP connections in the FIN_WAIT1 state

netstat_tcp_fin_wait2.Name: netstat_tcp_fin_wait2
netstat_tcp_fin_wait2.Help: The number of TCP connections in the FIN_WAIT2 state

netstat_tcp_last_ack.Name: netstat_tcp_last_ack
netstat_tcp_last_ack.Help: The number of TCP connections waiting for the client to send acknowledgement of the connection termination message

netstat_tcp_listen.Name: netstat_tcp_listen
netstat_tcp_listen.Help: The number of TCP ports currently listening for a connection request

netstat_tcp_none.Name: netstat_tcp_none
netstat_tcp_none.Help: The number of TCP connections with inactive clients

netstat_tcp_syn_sent.Name: netstat_tcp_syn_sent
netstat_tcp_syn_sent.Help: The number of TCP connections waiting for a matching connection request after having sent a connection request

netstat_tcp_syn_recv.Name: netstat_tcp_syn_recv
netstat_tcp_syn_recv.Help: The number of TCP connections waiting for connection request acknowledgement after having sent and received a connection request

netstat_tcp_time_wait.Name: netstat_tcp_time_wait
netstat_tcp_time_wait.Help: The number of TCP connections currently waiting to ensure that the client received the acknowledgement of its connection termination request

netstat_udp_socket.Name: netstat_udp_socket
netstat_udp_socket.Help: The number of current UDP connections

processes_blocked.Name: processes_blocked
processes_blocked.Help: The number of processes that are blocked

processes_dead.Name: processes_dead
processes_dead.Help: The number of processes that are dead

processes_idle.Name: processes_idle
processes_idle.Help: The number of processes that are idle

processes_paging.Name: processes_paging
processes_paging.Help: The number of processes that are paging

processes_running.Name: processes_running
processes_running.Help: The number of processes that are running

processes_sleeping.Name: processes_sleeping
processes_sleeping.Help: The number of processes that are sleeping

processes_stopped.Name: processes_stopped
processes_stopped.Help: The number of processes that are stopped

processes_total.Name: processes_total
processes_total.Help: The total number of processes on the instance

processes_total_threads.Name: processes_total_threads
processes_total_threads.Help: The total number of threads making up the processes

processes_wait.Name: processes_wait
processes_wait.Help: The number of processes that are paging

swap_free.Name: swap_free
swap_free.Help: The amount of swap space that isn't being used

swap_used.Name: swap_used
swap_used.Help: The amount of swap space currently in use

swap_used_percent.Name: swap_used_percent
swap_used_percent.Help: The percentage of swap space currently in use
